strong.div:
1) Interest will be recovered @24% per annum on overdue unpaid bills. Claim of any nature whatever will lapse unless raised in writing within 3 days from the date of invoice.
2) Goods once sold cannot be returned and / or exchanged.
3) We reserve the right to demand the payment of this bill at any time before the due date.
4) Payment to be made at our office by account payee's cheque.
5) All disputes subject to Mumbai jurisdiction only.
6) I / We hereby certify that my / our registration certificate under the Maharashtra Value Added tax Act 2002 is in force on the date which the sale of goods specified in this tax invoice is made by me / us and the transaction sale covered by the Tax Invoice.had been effected by us and it shall be accounted for in the turnover of sales while filling of return and due tax, if payable on the sale has been paid or shall be paid.

border:1px solid; vertical-align: top; background-color: white; padding:12px; padding-top:3px
